title: CoinBTM
extract: Bitcoin is a new currency that was created in 2009 by an unknown person using the alias Satoshi Nakamoto. Transactions are made through a decentralized computer network – meaning, no banks!
extract_html: Bitcoin is a new currency that was created in 2009 by an unknown person using the alias Satoshi Nakamoto. Transactions are made through a decentralized computer network – meaning, no banks!
